name: Minke-web
tagline: GWT Web App and GAE Server for Crowdsourced Pricetracker
body:
### Welcome to Minke.
Minke, a simple, yet powerful shopping assistant. It has a [web interface](http://shop-minke.appspot.com/) maintained [here](https://github.com/godfried/minke-web) and an Android app which can be found here [here](http://godfried.github.com/minke-android/). Minke focuses on bringing you accurate and relevant information about products and stores through the use of the ZXing Barcode Scanner. Furthermore it provides additional shopping information such as which is the best store to do shopping for your shopping list and allows you to compare products across stores.

***

### Author
In 2012, Pieter Jordaan (@pieterjordaan) started work on Minke.

***
